Liushutong characters (1)

毘字的基本解释

毘
pí
同“毗”。

毘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》房脂切，平脂，並。］
［《集韻》頻脂切，平脂，並。］
亦作“毘1”。亦作“1”。
(1)肚脐。
(2)辅佐；帮助。
(3)阿附。
(4)厚，笃。
(5)近，接近。
(6)连接。参见“毗鄰”、“毗連”。
(7)损伤；破坏。
(8)通“卑”。参见“毗戲”。
(9)春秋时鲁国城邑名。
(10)姓。明代正统间有举人毗宠。见《万姓统谱·支韵》。

毘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【比字部】　毘； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页591第07
同毗。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" Fangzhi cut, flat fat, and. ]
["Jiyun" frequency fat cut, flat fat, and. ]
Also known as "Pi 1". Also called "1".
(1) The belly button.
(2) Assistant; help.
(3) Afu.
(4) Thick and strong.
(5) Near, close.
(6) Connection. See "adjacent", "adjacent".
(7) Damage; destruction.
(8) Through "basic". See "Pixi".
(9) The name of the city of Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period.
(10) Last name. There was Juren Pi Chong in the Ming Dynasty orthodox. See "Wan Xing Genealogy · Zhi Yun".
